description: This PHP file generates a web interface for managing network devices within a parental control system. It includes HTML, JavaScript, and server-side PHP code to display, add, edit, and delete allowed and blocked devices, as well as toggle management features via AJAX calls.

methods.name: init_psmMode
methods.description: Initializes the page mode and navigation based on parameters.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves configuration strings or parameters by path.

methods.name: getParaValues
methods.description: Fetches parameter values for device management from configuration.

methods.name: days_time_conversion_get
methods.description: Converts times and days to local timezone if necessary.
